Crime in California

2013-07-30 07:46:00 -0600

I’ve been working with our content people lately on using Tableau to visualize relevant content for our websites. This map and data table of burglaries in California in 2011 is part of a series of Tableau dashboards I created for Safewise.com and hosted on Tableau Public.
